meanings.sent1: After moving out, they decided to rerents the apartment for another year.
meanings.sent2: She rerents her vacation home every summer to different families.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie showed a character trying to rerents the same car multiple times.
meanings.sent4: His love for the city was so strong that he felt the need to rerents the same apartment every time he visited.
meanings.sent5: The idea of rerenting a bicycle for the weekend seemed like a convenient option.

meanings.sent1: The rerents of the beach house were always respectful and tidy.
meanings.sent2: As rerents of the property, they had the option to extend their lease for another year.
meanings.sent3: The group of rerents organized a community barbecue to get to know each other better.
meanings.sent4: The rerents of the cabin formed a close bond over their shared love for the outdoors.
meanings.sent5: Being rerents of the same building, they often bumped into each other in the hallway.
